text: Abdou Diouf (born 7 September 1935) was president of Senegal from 1981 to 2000. He was the second president since the country became independent. Diouf was the Secretary General of La Francophonie from 2003 to 2014. ==References== Diouf, Abdou Diouf, Abdou Category:Living people Category:Prime ministers of Senegal
title: Abdou Diouf
